name().notice: Returns the name of the Well function.

symbol().notice: Returns the symbol of the Well function.

documentation.text: @dev calculate the mathematical product of an array of uint[]

@author Publius
 @title Constant Product pricing function for Wells with 2 tokens
 Constant Product Wells use the formula:
  `π(b_i) = (s / n)^n`
 Where:
  `s` is the supply of LP tokens
  `b_i` is the reserve at index `i`
  `n` is the number of tokens in the Well
